References for external functions:

CircStat2012a:
P. Berens, CircStat: A Matlab Toolbox for Circular Statistics, Journal of Statistical Software, Volume 31, Issue 10, 2009
http://www.jstatsoft.org/v31/i10
https://www.mathworks.com/matlabcentral/fileexchange/10676-circular-statistics-toolbox-directional-statistics



circ_ksdensity:
Kernel density estimation for circular functions version 1.5.0.0 by Dylan Muir
http://dylan-muir.com/articles/circular_kernel_estimation/

https://www.mathworks.com/matlabcentral/fileexchange/44072-kernel-density-estimation-for-circular-functions?s_tid=prof_contriblnk
